alert.note: Alert for Bayamon; Dorado; Toa Alta; Toa Baja; Vega Alta (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 01 at 5:01PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Bayamon, Dorado, Toa Alta, Toa Baja and Vega Alta. * WHEN...Until 600 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 401 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Toa Alta, Toa Baja, Sabana Seca, Bayamon, Dorado, Vega Alta, Guaynabo, Ceiba, San Jose, Candelaria, Rio Lajas, Campanilla, Galateo, Pajaros, Candelaria Arenas, H. Rivera Colon, Ingenio, Levittown, Brenas and Monserrate. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

area.areaDesc: Bayamon; Dorado; Toa Alta; Toa Baja; Vega Alta
